chapters.title: Chapter 48: Near Avendesora
chapters.info: Metalan, p. 719—Norlesh's husband during Aviendha's second step through the columns of Rhuidean on her second trip. He was once a good man, but he is now a shell of what he once was. His cheeks are sunken, and his once-vibrant blue eyes now look glazed. Three of his children have died within the last year and a half.
